EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_USBankingReport2014_Q414.Nurture 2
EmailTemplate.subject: How the cashless economy and digital world are transforming your retail experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Based on your interest in our 2014 U.S. Banking and Financials Trends Report <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/US-Banking-and-Financial-Services-Mobile-Trends-Report-Pivotal-Labs.pdf>, I thought you might also find value in this blog post discussing how the cashless economy and digital world are transforming your retail experiences. <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/features/how-the-new-cashless-economy-and-digital-world-is-transforming-your-retail-experiences>
If you have any questions or would to schedule a consultation with our mobile experts at Pivotal Labs, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
